attributes.action: Create a Bank Holiday to Celebrate St Georges Day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As an Englishman, I feel it is just and right that St Georges Day is celebrated with a bank holiday. Please can the Prime Minister and Government consider adding a bank holiday for this pivotal day in English History.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
